query:
UPDATE flows
                SET flow_status = $2, last_event_id = $3, enqueued_for = $4
                WHERE flow_id = $1 AND (
                    last_event_id IS NULL AND CAST($5 as BIGINT) IS NULL OR
                    last_event_id IS NOT NULL AND CAST($5 as BIGINT) IS NOT NULL AND last_event_id = $5
                )
                RETURNING flow_id
